articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: EU’s top diplomat accuses Trump of ‘appeasement’ with Putin - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “Any deal behind our backs will not work,” writes Kaja Kallas as U.S. president imparts “lengthy and highly productive” call with Russian leader.
articles.content: Trump said Wednesday he'd had a lengthy and highly productive phone call with Putin that morning, confirming the two leaders had agreed to work together on a diplomatic resolution to the war in Ukrai… [+561 chars]
